title: Olympic Track Ace Hits Back after Blacklisting by Australian Cycling in Nationality Spat: ‘It’s Just Words’
content:
War of words unfurls after multiple track medalist Matthew Richardson was banned from representing Australia following 'defection' to Great Britain.

Read the full article at Olympic Track Ace Hits Back after Blacklisting by Australian Cycling in Nationality Spat: ‘It’s Just Words’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
